article_title: Significant drop seen in Yellowstone County women getting mammograms
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , mammograms, medicine, oncology, cancer screening, health_medical_pharma, mammography, yellowstone county, breast, melody thompson

og.description: For nearly two decades, nothing could stop Melody Thompson from getting her annual mammogram. Then, lulled into a sense of false security, she became complacent.
